group_1.textCenter: I looked into what you asked.
Everyone who was attacked in the beginning...
They were "inside a Labyrinth in Chuo@Ward".
They were attacked by people claiming to be@"Magical Girls from a rival ward".
Apart from Mel, they couldn't identify the@Magical Girls who attacked them.

group_1.textLeft: Just as I thought.
The attackers didn't say they were from the@"west" or the "east".
We just assumed it was the opposing side.

group_1.textRight: That's so underhanded! Who would do this?!

group_1.textLeft: We don't have any proof...
But if it happened within a Labyrinth,@I suspect it was a Witch's doing.

group_1.textRight: Do you think they were being manipulated?

group_1.textLeft: The chances of that are slim.
Mel wasn't in Chuo Ward at all.
When Momoko was attacked, we went to@investigate.
I suspect we went to the Witch's Labyrinth@that's behind all of this.
We plan on going back there to solve this@problem.

group_1.textRight: You figured this out first. I won't get@involved unless you want me to.

group_1.textLeft: Actually, we'd like to ask for your help.
To be honest, the last time we went... @It was too much for us.
The Labyrinth was too complex, and we never@even found the Witch...
Also...
You being there would help put the Chuo@Ward Magical Girls at ease.
There could be a misunderstanding if we just@went on our own.
If you're with us, Kanagi, they'll know this@isn't about a turf war.
We'll be able to show them that we really@only want to settle the problem.
Will you please help us?

group_1.textRight: That isn't exactly something I can say no@to, now is it?
Besides, this isn't just your problem now.
This is something that affects Magical Girls@from both the east and the west.
So I'm asking you, too. Please fight by our@side until this matter is settled.

group_1.textLeft: Agreed!
Thank you for doing this!
Wait. Let me call Momoko and the others.
Do you have any Magical Girls who could help@us fight?

group_1.textRight: I know some capable Magical Girls, but they@probably can't help right now.
You can count on me, though.

group_1.textLeft: Understood. We'll do that.
